Icon.Name: ID65385
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:65385 124.54,-42.77,430.33 Tinkerfest Public Quest - World Event occurs in July/August annyally - Three Stages - 1 -rt-click, get parts from repair bots, rt-click, hack disabled bots, kill 50 berserker bots (while in bot form) - stage 2 - click Kerser, floating bot follows MK, equip Magnifier, rt click chests and disarm, if you do not get a crafting screen walk away, it will explode - if you do, craft a bomb and throw it at MK-II, he will emote "Ouch" and take damage, when 50% health... - stage 3 - Pillars in corners of area must be destroyed, 5 rounds of 4 pillars before it is done; after pillars are down, run to the named MK-II because a random player will get an electric field on them and will not be able to move out of it - only the field hurts the boss, until the field hits him, the pillars will not reappear. Loot the chest and the ginormous pile - both - for all the loot.

Icon.PoiDescription: ID:69413 -527.18,-48.00,64.38 - This is where you need to lead the dearly departed zombies to reunite the two undead lovers for the Erollisi Day PQ 'Love Will Lead You Back'. - To do this head to either the dearly departed zombie in the Turmoil Cemetery or the one in the Graveyard Plains and hand them the color of rose that matches its glow with the [a red rose] and [a yellow rose] that you can pick along its trail. - Make also sure to turn purple and black rose into ash to avoid adds from spawning.

Icon.Name: ID29130
Icon.PoiDescription:
ID:29130 -69.00,0.00,103.00 This is part of the Bloodline Chronicles progression quests for both good and evil.
The first step is to find and plunder an ornate sarcophagus and an elegant sarcophagus in the Tombs of Night:
Ornate: 27, -23, 89 Elegant: -69, 0, 103
After inspecting both sarcophagus, Qaseid R'Syd will spawn. He is a level 35 vampire. Kill him and the quest will advance.
After this you must kill:
- 10 Neonate Vapmires (near the elegant sarcophagus) - 5 Adherant Vampires: -3, -24, 97 - 5 Bloodsworn Vampires: -64, -24, 17
After doing this return to Laren in Nektulos for coin and experience. This will also open up the Building a Vessel quest.

ID:29129 27.00,-23.00,89.00 This is part of the evil character progressional quests for the Bloodline Chronicles. It is given by Laren Jadefire at the evil camp in Nektulos (423, 27, -1477). The quest takes place inside of the Tombs of Night.
The first step is to find and plunder an ornate sarcophagus and an elegant sarcophagus in the Tombs of Night:
Ornate: 27, -23, 89 Elegant: -69, 0, 103
After inspecting both sarcophagus, Qaseid R'Syd will spawn. He is a level 35 vampire. Kill him and the quest will advance.
After this you must kill:
- 10 Neonate Vapmires (near the elegant sarcophagus) - 5 Adherant Vampires: -3, -24, 97 - 5 Bloodsworn Vampires: -64, -24, 17
After doing this return to Laren in Nektulos for coin and experience. This will also open up the Building a Vessel quest.

Icon.Name: ID59586
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:59586 -15.59,59.98,-32.50 CoT:Vengeance (raid), if you don't dps him fast enough, he summons 3 waves of mirror images of himself (adds). This seems to have changed now, more recently it seems he does not summon them for 3 min, then they add at 15 sec intervals. They will appear even after he is dead, so it's a script. IN NON-RAID: Toward the end of Bloodline Chronicles you also have to kill this mob here, the script is different, you must go find the coffin in a room beyond and destroy it first before confronting him, or he will not die, he will heal himself. There's a room full of coffins, one darker one.
